edu.oakland.classProject.production

Interface ICore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Core

    public interface ICore
    ICore class represents the interface that Core must implement The two classes that depend on this class are Core and MockCore Core actually computes these functions based on the SLRq while MockCore uses db style getters and setters to ensure the MainTest passes the JUnit tests
